artist: Artist: After Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Suginoya Mieda; Author: Poem by Haru Hajime; Author: Poem by Soramitsuya Maeda
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Three poems (kyōka) by Suginoya Mieda 杉廼屋未枝, Haru Hajime 春恥女, and Soramitsuya Maeda 空満屋真枝
空満屋連和漢武勇合三番之内 大井子と樊噲
(Original descriptions of poems)
杉迺屋末枝
谷の戸をひらきて出る鶯の斯うもゆたかな春の酒盃

春　恥女
紫の露の眉をひき立て力もつよく見ゆる佐保姫

空満屋真枝
花笠を盃にしてうくひすも露をくめる春の生酔

(Current Japanese translation of poems)
谷の戸を開きて出ずる鶯の　こうも豊かな春の酒盃

紫の露の眉を引き立てて　力も強く見ゆる佐保姫

花笠を盃にして鶯も　露を汲める春の生酔い
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Chinese and Japanese Heroes for the Soramitsuya Circle: A Series of Three (Soramitsuya ren wakan buyū awase sanban no uchi 空満屋連和漢武勇合三番之内)
signed: Hokusai Taito aratame Katsushika Iitsu hitsu 北斎戴斗改葛飾為一筆
title: Ōiko and Fan Kuai
